It's so much fun to tease Shizuko like that. She gets so flustered!
What? Mr. Crab is evolving!
Saori never backs down! But has she finally reached her limit?
Episode 70 takes us to the Game Development Department, and on that day, Schale received a grim reminder...
Episode 71 takes us to the After-School Sweets Club.So, "anything" and "anything" actually mean two completely different things...

You jinxed it.
Episode 76 is from the Seminar!What secrets are held by the water bottle that Yuuka's looking for?

Koharu's always had an...active imagination, and these shadows aren't helping!

Looks like the competitive fire of the Kivotos Halo Festival hasn't been put out yet. ðŸ”¥
When that last leaf falls, it will by my final...
Aris boosted her Appeal stat with a new skin! All she needs now is a manicure and she'll get a set bonus!
I suppose 20 km is easy for someone as amazing as Sumire!
Don't worry, Sensei, Shigure has a special drink ready for you too!
Wow, it's president Rio's fully automated barista machine!It must function with absolute perfection!
There's nothing more rewarding than charity work. You're awesome, Serina!
Chairman Makoto's charismatic ploy doesn't even phase Cherino. Red Winter is certainly a cut above when it comes to coup d'Ã©tat!
Haruna has such a big personality that it's impossible for her scenes NOT to be dynamic! (Good thing it wasn't a bomb...)
Poor Fuuka! It seems the New Year's fresh start didn't help her neuroses much.
Captain Mine...You're not trying to say we should...eliminate them, are you? >_<
Maybe we can mass-produce and sell RABBIT Squad helmets and we'll finally be free from a life of expired bentos...
Mika is just as cheerful as everâ€”even in prison! And her friendship with Nagisa, who secretly worries for her, is evident.
They made a short interview even shorter in the worst possible way!If this bad press is any indicator, then the pen really is mightier than the sword..
Isn't it a bit suspicious that Noa agreed to send Koyuki to the 'sea' so easily? What's she up to?
Hanako may not have been the best person to ask for advice...But Sakurako's new profile picture is perfect! That was textbook gap moe! ^o^
Looks like it's moving day for the Kivotos Student Council!Even on moving day, Momoka is still lazing about...Well, if she falls asleep in a box, guess she'll get packed up too!
Toki takes lessons from her upperclassmen at C&C very seriously! Naturally she strives for absolute purrfection in everything she does, including this!
The Masked Swimsuit Ganâ€”No. The Abydos Foreclosure Task Force is hard at work cleaning up the pool.Obviously some outfits are a little too comfortable for hard work... ^-^;
Koyuki! A little bad luck doesn't give you free license to attack a food company!Clearly the Seminar members have their hands full today...
Thanks to your fervent support, we've released 100 episodes of the Blue Archive Official 4-Panel Manga!
Is it really considered noise canceling if you're just drowning it out with metal? You can't argue with results, but it seems Aru isn't quite used to heavy metal just yet! ^-^;
It seems Haruka's completely freaking out again... Hopefully she'll gain a bit more perspective and confidence this new year.
It's tough not to indulge when there's a veritable feast in front of you! But don't hold back too much, or it could be bad for your health, Izuna!
As expected, Tomoe's single-minded dedication to President Cherino and her excellent speaking skills have captured the hearts of the Red Winter students!...Captured ...Right?
Hyakkiyako's professional ambassador, Kaho, got caught organizing all her Chise merch!
It seems Haruka's completely freaking out again... Hopefully she'll gain a bit more perspective and confidence this new year.
Toki is on an undercover mission with the Game Development Department!Wait, what happens if her opponent uses rock...?
Kazusa's compliment certainly caught Reisa off guard. She's so cute when she's flustered! *^-^*
Hifumi would travel to the ends of Kivotos to save Peroro!Too bad it was just Azusa's swimcap... ^^;
This painfully bright golden light seems familiar somehowâ€¦Bah! My eyes! >_<;
Ah, Mina! Remember, the whole point of fiction is that it isn't real!
The quickest way to find Minori? Just look for the nearest protest!
The quickest way to find Minori? Just look for the nearest protest!
It's so sweet that Niko takes the RABBIT Squad members under her wing and cares for them like her own!
When bait starts raining down from the sky, you know it's going to be a weird day...Will Miyu be all right?ðŸ˜¢
Curse or no curse, if you come across something like that in the middle of the night, RUN!
Warm-up exercises are all well and good, Ako, but do you really need to record them? o_o;
Thanks to Saya's elixir, Shun looks as young as ever!Unfortunately, it made her smaller and weaker too. She doesn't stand a chance against Kokona!
What a great plan!Put in a little time following that fish, and there might be a big payoff!But...what's with the ribbon...?
Only Hanako would take every opportunity to make Koharu uncomfortable...
Reading and sunbathing are the perfect combo for a relaxing day...unless you're Ui. ^^;Still, you need plenty of sunshine to get enough Vitamin D!
It seems mere proximity to Sumire guarantees a healthier life!Of course, the process may be a little...uncomfortable.
Not even the tiniest detail escapes Mimori's notice. She's incredible!
Meru's creative anguish is palpable!Perhaps it helps keep the rivalry between Meru and Momiji alive.
Embracing cosplay is such an intriguing way to sell your fanfic!And when it comes to marketing, Yakumo knows best... ^^;
Kotoriâ€™s passion for cheering on her friends is incredible, but her endurance is off the charts!
No gold medal prize can compare to food in the eyes of the Gourmet Research Society!
Ah! Sensei! Don't misunderstand!It didn't stop because the robot's too weak to carry Yuuka!Nothing like that!
We'd tell you to work on your poker face Koharu, but it looks like a guilty conscience needs no accuser! ^-^
Leave it to Gehenna Academy to think up such mammoth ideas as using the hot springs as a giant hot pot!What imagination!
Shigure's tail looks so soft and fluffy! I totally understand why Nodoka mistook it for a pillow ^^;
It's just like Kasumi to shamelessly ask for help from one of her sworn enemies...How is she going to dig herself out of this one?!
It's a rare opportunity to listen to a duet between Utaha and Himari, who both love enka! (But what about fixing Himari's wheelchair?)
The Engineering Department members sure have an interesting idea of what "cute" means!
It may not be possible to turn back time, but these two are making memories where the happiness of their youth lives forever.
